name: Yasin Guergaf
summary: Dynamic and detail-oriented DevOps and Cybersecurity Engineer with over 10 years of experience across system engineering, software development, and DevOps practices. Proven track record in automating infrastructure provisioning, enhancing deployment pipelines, and implementing secure coding practices. Strong background in cybersecurity engineering, incident response automation, and cloud platform integration. Adept at bridging communication between technical teams and stakeholders and mentoring junior engineers. Holds certifications in Security+, AWS Cloud, and Scrum methodology. Former U.S. Marine with demonstrated leadership in high-stakes environments.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Cyber Security Engineering

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Automated infrastructure provisioning and configuration using infrastructure-as-code, increasing deployment efficiency and minimizing human error.
Developed robust CI/CD pipelines to streamline integration, testing, and deployment workflows across staging and production environments.
Led efforts to migrate legacy monolithic applications to containerized microservices using Docker and Kubernetes.

Developed and maintained Python-based automation scripts and tooling to orchestrate infrastructure provisioning, deployment validation, configuration enforcement, and health checks across cloud and containerized environments.
Integrated monitoring tools to provide real-time system health insights, reducing mean time to resolution (MTTR).
Enforced security policies and access controls across DevOps tools and environments to uphold compliance requirements.
Conducted infrastructure audits and performance testing to identify bottlenecks and recommend optimization strategies.
Supported incident response processes by deploying automated rollback and alerting mechanisms.
Leveraged tools such as Ansible and Terraform to enforce consistency across all deployment environments.
Collaborated cross-functionally with development and operations teams to align deployment strategies with business goals.
Standardized and documented all DevOps workflows to improve onboarding and knowledge transfer across teams.

jobs.title: Software Engineer

Collaborated with QA and DevOps teams to integrate automated testing and deployment processes into CI/CD pipelines.
Built and documented a complete development environment setup process tailored for use within secure government networks.
Authored and maintained technical documentation, including system diagrams, API specifications, and development guidelines.
